title: Lake Meredith National Recreation Area: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         The autumn foliage display along the Mullinaw Trail is beautiful. NPS Photo  The park is open all year round, 24 hours a day. Use extreme caution while driving on back country roads after rains or snows. Headquarters Building in Fritch:  8:00 AM - 4:30 PM Monday - Friday. Summer Season, Memorial Day - Labor Day: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM Monday -    Saturday. Closed Sunday.  Closed on holidays between Labor Day and Memorial Day.
